title: Idealite - Gurney Plaza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Organic, Delivery, Take-out, Malaysian
description: 品味舒食 operates multiple outlets; this one opened Dec 2013. Advertises as a wholesome dining place. No add white sugar, white salt, MSG, synthetic. Uses whole grains, brown sugar, rock salt, fruits and vegetables that have been cleaned in an ozone machine.
